channel.title: Clean?
channel.description:
Heya , im looking to clean my reapagescape , does anyone know how things are "cleaned" ? what do i remove? and stuff like that.
thanks.

item.title: Clean?
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote="_™, post:9, topic:288580"][quote author=Lewis) link=topic=381546.msg2867060#msg2867060 date=1247514809]

Redownloading a server with a bunch of shit added is not clean. An example of clean is a server witha client.java <500kb and no handlers.

Lewis, remove whatever’s not being used. Then, go back and remove all the stuff being used that will never be needed.

so i can delete makeglobalobject list without it hurting anything?
[/quote]

You have to know how to delete something, delete everytime it’s used, and delete anything associating with it.[/quote]

well that dont really help me , i dont really know if i should delete the big long list of “makeglobalobject” and “deleteglobalobject” or if i should leave it because its important.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 01:57:02 pm[/size][hr]winterlove laggs , unstable and has no specs and i really dont know how to add specs.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Even ‘cleaned’ sources have shit in it. I downloaded DefaultScape because I heard it was basic and whatnot. 1kb client.java. Now? Almost 600kb. There is SO MUCH in every server you’ll ever download.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Redownloading a server with a bunch of shit added is not clean. An example of clean is a server witha client.java <500kb and no handlers.

Lewis, remove whatever’s not being used. Then, go back and remove all the stuff being used that will never be needed.

item.title: Clean?
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

_™:

Read every line of every file and take out the useless shit. I’ve lost over 400kb of information by doing that for a couple hours.

o right , do you know the objectremove method , can i delite all of that? or will the objects re-appear?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 01:47:14 pm[/size][hr][quote=“fatwallet, post:3, topic:288580”]Redownload im guessing? That is considered clean? I’m not sure anyone has programmed an auto-clean for a server. That would be pretty good actually.

Actually, just un-zip or un-rar the server again? That would work[/quote]

i mean removing the junk from files.

Read full topic

item.description:
